channel.title: New PvP Zone [PI], cannot attack!
channel.description: Hello everyone, I have been using "InsdiaX" base and I made Varrock a PvP area. The problem is though it gives me -10 as the wilderness level. I cannot attack anyone, even if they are the same level as I. Any help is appreciated, thanks. :)

item.title: New PvP Zone [PI], cannot attack!
item.dc:creator: @rich_noob_xd rich noob xd
item.description:
@rich_noob_xd wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:27, topic:427768”]inb4supercomesandrapesallofuwithashovel

Go to combatassistant.java and find the boolean checkReqs()
and just add something like

if(inVarrockArea())//change this to whatever you're boolean is.
return false;

The -10 won’t necessarily matter unless you want it to show the levels they can attack, then you’d have to add another check in process under the wild check but just alter it.[/quote]

I do not care so much about the -10, but I cannot attack anyone, nor can they attack me, even when we are the same level. No I have not fixed this yet. :S

Read full topic

item.title: New PvP Zone [PI], cannot attack!

item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Stop spamming this thread. I like how you got your friend to back you up. If you're referring to asshole_rule, we've already settled our differences. You kids don't scare me, if you want to play hardball I can pull your (insert personal details here) and call you. You can spend the day explaining to me why you're so mad at me.

I’m not mad at you, judo is far from my friend and i’m not trying to scare you. I’m just sticking up for someone who you we’re making innapropriate posts towards. If you want my personal details heres my number. 1 (905)-Fuck-you

item.title: New PvP Zone [PI], cannot attack!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

inb4supercomesandrapesallofuwithashovel

Go to combatassistant.java and find the boolean checkReqs()
and just add something like

if(inVarrockArea())//change this to whatever you're boolean is.
return false;

The -10 won’t necessarily matter unless you want it to show the levels they can attack, then you’d have to add another check in process under the wild check but just alter it.

item.title: New PvP Zone [PI], cannot attack!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:18, topic:427768”][quote author=pot up pls link=topic=530462.msg3873590#msg3873590 date=1325519233]

int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1);

Look at how it’s handled in the wild and apply it to what you’re doing.

But I guess you could do it like

if(absX > 3209 && absX < 3220 && absY > 3423 && absY < 3434 ) { wildLevel = 10; }

That, but it would be a bad way to do it. You would have to keep making new conditions like if(absX > 3209 && absX < 3220 && absY > 3423 && absY < 3434 ) { which means you would need to keep changing the wild level under that.

Inb4 Team_Rocket tells you otherwise.
[/quote]

Lol, I don’t mind if he tells him another way to do it, but he keeps attempting to disprove/slander what I say… lol.[/quote]

The only reason I do that is because you’re always flaming and trolling my posts for no reason at all.

On topic: Have you got it working yet?

Read full topic

item.title: New PvP Zone [PI], cannot attack!
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:11, topic:427768”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=530462.msg3873563#msg3873563 date=1325518346]

algorithm

You keep using that word, but you don’t know what it means. A.K.A. exactly what I said.

That’s why I used it properly in that sentence. Someones mad because they looked stupid.

@kid that needs help

in the process Method in client.java

Someone’s mad because the new-comer is better than the veteran. Like I said, I’ve always been better and always will be. I don’t get why you’re always mad at me. Maybe It’s because I’m an Alpha and you’re a Beta? Grow up and cut your hair kid.

I guarantee you’re not better then me. How about we have a little friendly competition(seriously). PM me if you’re intrested. I was thinking we both make a tutorial and let people vote on who’s is better?

P.S you’re probably talking about a pic from a long time ago, I have cut my hair, and I posted it in the irl pictures thread…
[/quote]

Kayceee agrees with me and I don’t even know the person. I’ve been working with R.S.P.S. for 5 and 1/2 years and I’m 19 years old, you’ve been working with them for like 4 years, and you’re 15? I don’t even need to have a “friendly” competition to tell you that I’m better than you.

inb4 the other mad veteran kid takes your side.[/quote]
you’re an idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: New PvP Zone [PI], cannot attack!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“rich noob xd, post:13, topic:427768”]Guys if anyone can help out on the actual topic would be nice.

Anyways I was thinking is there any way to make it so certain coords equal a wilderness level such as instead of

if(inVarrock()) {
wildLevel = 10;
}

if(absX > 3209 && absX < 3220 && absY > 3423 && absY < 3434 ) {
wildLevel = 10;
}

Again I am new at this, don’t flame me, lol. :P[/quote]

You don’t even need to use an Int for that, you can just use a return.

@asshole_rule I don’t want a competition because tutorials can just be ripped out of bases. I have a TON of friends who could just give me original content that I could claim as my own, and I’m guessing It’s the same case with you as well.

Read full topic
